Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem at Polk. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier signal problem at Polk. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.


Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Ashland/Lake to 54th/Cermak in both directions until midnight.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
